app.name: Moe Copy AI
app.description: A cute AI-powered web content extraction assistant
popup.title: Web Content Extraction
popup.noContentTip: Please ensure the page is fully loaded
popup.subtitle: Moe Scrape
popup.description: Extract current page content into AI-friendly format
popup.descriptionDetail: Supports original format (preserves Markdown and line breaks) and compact mode (no line breaks, more concise)
popup.batchScrapeTip: Batch scrape documents (opens in side panel)
popup.floatButton.label: Floating Button:
popup.floatButton.tempHideTip: Temporarily hide floating button, will restore after refresh
popup.floatButton.closeTip: Quickly disable floating button (can be changed in settings)
popup.floatButton.openTip: Quickly enable floating button (can be changed in settings)
popup.error.title: Error
popup.error.possibleCauses: Possible causes: network issues, page structure changes, or content not fully loaded
popup.error.suggestion: Suggestion: Refresh the page and try again, or wait for the page to fully load
popup.debug.title: Debug Info
popup.mode.fallbackInfo: This is a normal smart fallback mechanism to ensure you always get content
popup.noContentMessage: No content found. Click "Refresh" to retry or open a new tab.
popup.footer: Moe Copy AI - Moe Scrape v{version}
sidepanel.desc.singlescrape: Scrape current page content into AI-friendly format
sidepanel.desc.batch: Select page area and batch scrape all linked documents
sidepanel.desc.extraction: Select page elements and extract in various formats
option.title: Moe Copy AI Settings
option.subtitle: A cute AI-powered web content extraction assistant
option.extraction.title: Extraction Mode
option.extraction.mode.hybrid.desc: Prioritizes Readability algorithm, falls back to selectors when needed
option.extraction.mode.selector.desc: Uses CSS selectors for content extraction, supports custom selectors
option.extraction.mode.readability.desc: Uses Readability algorithm to automatically identify and extract main content
option.extraction.selector.info: Uses predefined CSS selectors for content extraction with high precision. You can add custom selectors in "Selector Settings" to adapt to specific websites.
option.extraction.readability.info: Uses Mozilla Firefox Reader Mode's underlying algorithm to accurately identify article content and automatically remove ads and irrelevant elements. Ideal for most news sites, blogs, and article pages.
option.extraction.hybrid.info: Uses both selector and Readability methods to extract content, intelligently evaluates and selects higher quality results. This approach combines the advantages of both methods and works well for all types of websites.
option.log.title: Log Settings
option.log.debug.desc: Enable detailed debug logs in the console for troubleshooting
option.log.level.label: Log Level
option.log.level.desc: Set the plugin's log level. Lower levels include more detailed information but may affect performance.
option.log.scrapeTiming.label: Scrape Timing
option.log.scrapeTiming.desc: Set when to scrape webpage content. Auto mode scrapes immediately after page load, manual mode only scrapes when explicitly requested.
option.log.levelExplanation.title: Log Level Explanation
option.log.levelExplanation.debugDesc: Detailed debug information, including scraping process and AI interaction details
option.log.levelExplanation.infoDesc: General informational messages, such as operation status and success notifications
option.log.levelExplanation.errorDesc: Error messages, such as scrape failures
option.interface.title: Interface Settings
option.interface.floatButton.desc: Control whether to show the floating button on web pages. When disabled, you can still use features via the browser extension icon
option.selector.title: Selector Settings
option.selector.custom.desc: Add custom CSS selectors for content extraction
option.selector.desc: Customize CSS selectors to extract content from web pages. Click a card to edit the corresponding selector type.
option.selector.type.author: Author Selector
option.selector.type.title: Title Selector
option.selector.type.content.desc: CSS selectors for extracting main page content
option.selector.type.author.desc: CSS selectors for extracting author information
option.selector.type.date.desc: CSS selectors for extracting publish date
option.selector.type.title.desc: CSS selectors for extracting article title, system will try to match in the order of selector list
option.selector.priority: Sorted by priority, from top to bottom
option.selector.titleRule1: System will try to match selectors strictly in the order from top to bottom
option.selector.titleRule2: It's recommended to place the most commonly used and reliable selectors at the top for better efficiency
option.selector.contentRule1: If the page contains article tags and no custom selector is specified, the article element with the longest content will be used
option.selector.contentRule2: If a custom selector is specified, it will be used first
option.selector.contentRule3: If no article tag is found or custom selector doesn't match, the default selector list will be tried in order
option.selector.contentRule4: If still no content is found, the system will try to find paragraph collections (at least 3 paragraphs with length > 30 characters)
option.selector.contentRule5: The last fallback is to extract the entire body content
option.selector.emptyList: No selectors, please add or restore defaults
option.selector.resetInfo: Default selectors restored, click Save to apply
option.selector.rulesIntro: Article content scraping uses the following strategies (by priority):
option.ai.title: AI Settings
option.ai.desc: Configure AI interface settings to make the AI assistant work better for you
option.ai.tips.title: Tips:
option.ai.tips.tip1: Keep your API key safe and do not share it with others
option.ai.tips.tip2: Different models have different capabilities and prices, choose the appropriate model based on your needs and monitor token usage
option.ai.tips.tip3: Currently only tested with DeepSeek API, local Ollama support coming soon
option.ai.baseUrl.label: Base URL (API Base URL)
option.ai.baseUrl.helper: Enter the base URL for the API service
option.ai.apiKey.label: API Key
option.ai.apiKey.helper: Enter your API key to access AI services
option.ai.model.label: AI Model
option.ai.model.helper: Select or enter the AI model to use
option.ai.systemPrompt.placeholder: You are a professional article summarizer. Extract and summarize the core points of the article.
option.ai.systemPrompt.helper: System prompt defines the AI assistant's behavior and capabilities. Note: This is included as part of user prompt rather than actual system prompt
option.dev.title: Developer Options
option.dev.debugPanel.label: Debug Panel
option.dev.debugPanel.desc: Control whether to show the debug panel. Debug panel provides additional technical information for development and troubleshooting.
option.dev.clearStorage.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all local storage data? This action cannot be undone.
ai.history.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history?
batch.selectElement.tip: Click to select an area containing links
extraction.selectElement.tip: Click to select an element to extract
content.title: Title
content.author: Author
content.fullscreen.help: Press ESC or click close button to exit
content.fullscreen.title: Markdown Preview
content.tokenization.title: Tokenization Result
content.tokenization.disclaimer: tokenization, results may vary from actual token usage)
